scripts.dev: pnpm templs hello && pnpm run localnode && sleep 5 && ts-node scripts/generateAccount.ts && pnpm templs faucet --network localnet && pnpm templs publish --network localnet --configPath ./assets/Scripts/templs.config.ts && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts localnet && tail -f localnode.nohup.out
scripts.dev:docker: pnpm templs hello && pnpm run localnode:docker && sleep 5 && ts-node scripts/generateAccount.ts && pnpm templs faucet --network localnet && pnpm templs publish --network localnet --configPath ./assets/Scripts/templs.config.ts && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts localnet && tail -f localnode.nohup.out
scripts.world-publsih-localnet: pnpm templs publish --network localnet --configPath ./assets/Scripts/templs.config.ts && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts localnet
scripts.world-publsih-devnet: pnpm templs publish --network devnet --configPath ./assets/Scripts/templs.config.ts && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts devnet
scripts.world-publsih-testnet: pnpm templs publish --network testnet --configPath ./assets/Scripts/templs.config.ts && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts testnet
scripts.world-publsih-mainnet: pnpm templs publish --network mainnet --configPath ./assets/Scripts/templs.config.ts && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts mainnet
scripts.world-upgrade-localnet: pnpm templs upgrade --network localnet --configPath ./assets/Scripts/templs.config.ts && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts localnet
scripts.world-upgrade-devnet: pnpm templs upgrade --network devnet --configPath ./assets/Scripts/templs.config.ts && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts devnet
scripts.world-upgrade-testnet: pnpm templs upgrade --network testnet --configPath ./assets/Scripts/templs.config.ts && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts testnet
scripts.world-upgrade-mainnet: pnpm templs upgrade --network mainnet --configPath ./assets/Scripts/templs.config.ts && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts mainnet
